document_data.name: Temple of Finder Wyvernspur
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of Finder Wyvernspur''' was a rather modest temple to the [[deity]] of the [[Finder Wyvernspur|same name]] in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Structure: This building stood roughly three stories tall.
document_data.History: Operating as a commonplace street-level shop up until the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, this building was then purchased and converted into a temple. However, the building was largely unaltered from its prior state.
